findings.title: Timely massUpdatePools During Pool Weight Changes
findings.description: If the call to `massUpdatePools()` is not immediately invoked before updating the pool weights, certain situations may be crafted to create an unfair reward distribution.

findings.title: Incompatibility With Deflationary/Rebasing Tokens
findings.description: The `MasterChef` contract is incompatible with deflationary/rebasing tokens due to its asset-transferring routines, which may lead to inconsistent internal asset balances.

findings.title: Duplicate Pool Detection And Prevention
findings.description: The MasterChef contract does not perform necessary sanity checks to prevent a new pool with a duplicate token from being added.
